me bufe ekata amatharawa owunge menu eke thawath bohomayak kama jathi kanna ganna puluwan.wisheshathwayak widiyata me menu eke thiyana ooni kamak owun ewele hadala pirinamannata sudanam.sup warga omlat,sanwich ,bargars,sabmarin wage kamath,desart warga,milk shek wagema palathuru bimath mehi aawoth obata rasa balanna hakiyi.pradana aahara wela widiyata shri lankan set menu ekakuth me menu ekata athulath.wejitabal ,chikan ,fish wagema isso ekka me deshiya aahara wela 750-900 athara mila simawe kanna gana hakiyi.ee wagema eeshiyan fud konar namin chikan frayid rayis si fud frayid rayis chikan frayid nudls,si fud frayid rayis nudls wagema indyanu kramayata biriyani ekaka rasa balannath kamu awanhlata goda unoth puluwan.ee kama wargath 750-900 athara mila simawe pawathinne.
